description.ruby-sapphire:
A life-risking tackle that
slightly hurts the user.
description.emerald:
A life-risking tackle that
slightly hurts the user.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user throws an
electrified tackle.
It hurts the user
a little.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user electrifies
itself, then charges
at the foe. It causes
considerable damage
to the user as well.
description.platinum:
The user electrifies
itself, then charges
at the foe. It causes
considerable damage
to the user as well.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user electrifies
itself, then charges
at the foe. It causes
considerable damage
to the user as well.
description.black-white:
The user electrifies itself, then charges. 
It causes considerable damage to the user
and may leave the target with paralysis.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user electrifies itself, then charges.
It causes considerable damage to the user
and may leave the target with paralysis.
description.x-y:
The user electrifies itself, then charges.
This also damages the user quite a lot.
This may leave the target with paralysis.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user electrifies itself, then charges.
This also damages the user quite a lot.
This may leave the target with paralysis.
description.sun-moon:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.
description.sword-shield:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.shortEffect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
